title: Ratcliffe’s Reboot: Can Ineos Grenadiers Recapture its Tour de France Throne?
content:
Analysis: Nearly five years since its last yellow jersey, major restructuring at the British 'super team' reveals that billionaire team owner Jim Ratcliffe is pushing for return on his investment.

Read the full article at Ratcliffe’s Reboot: Can Ineos Grenadiers Recapture its Tour de France Throne? on Velo.
author: ahood
